scripts.dev: npm run write-php-ini && set-bash-title "⚡️ $npm_package_name"; npm run checkconfig && concurrently "onchange -i 'src/**/*' -- npm run devbuild" "php -c php.ini -S 0.0.0.0:$npm_package_config_port -t build/"
scripts.clean: npm run save-uploads && npm run save-acf-json && rm -Rf build && npm run postinstall
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && npm run fix-permissions && rsync -rlD ./build/ root@dev.akademi.agency:/var/www/CHANGEME.dev.akademi.agency
